title: Part One: RAM: Nazi Fight Club
itunes:title: Part One: RAM: Nazi Fight Club
description:
Garrison Davis is joined by Robert Evans to discuss Rise Above Movement.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://www.adl.org/resources/backgrounders/rise-above-movement-ram
  2. https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/extremist-files/group/rise-above-movement
  3. https://www.propublica.org/article/white-hate-group-campaign-of-menace-rise-above-movement
  4. https://nocara.blackblogs.org/2017/07/06/diy-division/
  5. https://www.ocweekly.com/charges-dropped-against-pepper-spraying-antifa-who-saved-oc-weekly-reporter-at-trump-rally-8161814/
  6. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fpt3ImXIImY&has_verified=1
  7. https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/frontline/film/documenting-hate-charlottesville/
  8. https://www.ocweekly.com/a-rising-star-in-pro-trump-circles-isnt-who-he-says-he-is-or-is-he-8066499/
  9. https://www.counterextremism.com/supremacy/hammerskin-nation-aka-hammerskins
  10. https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2018/02/the-terrifying-rise-of-alt-right-fight-clubs/
  11. https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2017/05/nathan-damigo-punching-woman-berkeley-white-nationalism/
  12. https://nocara.blackblogs.org/2018/10/17/rise-above-movement-arrests-state-repression-autonomous-anti-fascism/
  13. https://www.propublica.org/article/four-men-arrested-over-unrest-during-2017-unite-the-right-rally
  14. https://www.propublica.org/article/all-four-white-supremacists-charged-in-charlottesville-violence-plead-guilty
  15. https://apnews.com/article/race-and-ethnicity-virginia-california-charlottesville-prisons-ff272864758dff4c10b3656d06d3a539
  16. https://www.ocweekly.com/fbi-does-what-ocda-or-state-park-police-didnt-arrests-neo-nazis-who-assaulted-weekly-reporters/
  17. https://www.ocweekly.com/judge-dismisses-case-against-neo-nazi-rise-above-movement-members/?sfw=pass1607637708
  18. https://www.courthousenews.com/judge-tosses-all-charges-in-white-nationalist-rioting-plot/
  19. https://www.justice.gov/usao-wdva/pr/three-members-california-based-white-supremacist-group-sentenced-riots-charges-related
